features: DRY, SENSITIVE SKIN FACE WASH - is ultra gentle and non-stripping for soft, smooth, and comfortably clean skin.
GENTLE & EFFECTIVE - face wash removes dirt, oil and impurities without stripping or causing dryness, tightness or flakiness.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED - skin cleanser is also fragrance free, paraben free and SLS/SLES sulfate free.
GLOWING SKIN FACE MOISTURIZER - infused with Coconut Water, Prebiotics, and Avocado Oil.
GOOD FOR SKIN & THE PLANET - This moisturizer is Dermatologist Tested, Cruelty Free, Vegan Friendly and Carbon Neutral
body.description: Hydration is the key to glowing skin and starts with the first step in your skincare routine. That’s why this Bioré face wash replenishes skin while dissolving dirt and oil and removing impurities and pollution. The glow-making formula is infused with Coconut Water, known to be naturally hydrating, and Prebiotics, known to calm and balance skin. This face wash formulated for dry, sensitive skin is SLS/SLES sulfate free, fragrance free, and paraben free won’t cause dryness, tightness, or flakiness and leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and comfortably clean. It is also dermatologist tested, cruelty free, and vegan friendly. Use the Bioré Hydrate & Glow collection for skin so hydrated it glows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love Biore's sensitive skin moisturizers!
reviews.reviewText: Thanks to two different disorders (hEDS and MCAS) I have extremely sensitive skin AND I can't tolerate scented products. I have to be very careful with pretty much everything I bring into my home and use on my skin, which can be incredibly difficult. Plus, since everything in my home is unscented, I'm now even more sensitive to scents.Otherwise, I'm in my early 40's and have combination skin, and because it's so sensitive it's hard to find the right balance so that I'm either not too dried out, or getting too oily, or that doesn't trigger breakouts or allergic reactions.I started out at least 6 months ago with Biore's Clean Detox moisturizer, which is now my go-to warmer month moisturizer. It has no scent, is very lightweight and caused no reactions. But once the weather started cooling off I instantly found that one pump of the Clean Detox was no longer hydrating enough, and while I could probably do two pumps and be fine, figured I'd take the opportunity to try this version. And I'm glad I did!I won't say that it's 100% scent free, namely because the oils used do have a scent of their own, but there's definitely not added scent, and what does exist is very subtle. To a point that it doesn't bother me at all and others might not notice it at all. It's definitely a creamier/thicker moisturizer than the other, but not heavy at all, and absorbs as well as the Clean Detox does.Currently I'm still using both, depending on what my skin seems to need at the time, but once winter is here I suspect I'll be using this one full time. Thankfully transitioning between the two (which can also be tricky for my skin, it kinda freaks out if there's anything change) has also been easy, with no break outs or anything.So if you have anything close to skin issues like I do, I couldn't recommend these more, especially for the price considering that a little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good and gentle with my skin
reviews.reviewText: I bought the toner, washer and moisturizer and i love how it leaves my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this face soap on a whim because the ingredients are natural. It doesn’t foam or lather but it cleans my skin well. My skin feels smooth after using it. I don’t experience any irritation or unpleasant dryness. There is no unpleasant or lingering odor. It suits my needs well. I would recommend it for individuals with moderately dry skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought it as an emergency back up and surprisingly I absolutely love it and I’ve actually replaced my expensive Sunday Riley for this now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars OK for My Face!
reviews.reviewText: My dry face skin is more dry & sensitive for this brand to use except I didn't buy moisturize for day time. It does sting after I put on my face. Not sure what other brand will work better or I feel more improvement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been in Ghana for a while and my skin was a mess.I ordered this as soon as I got back to the states and I can see my face looking a bit better. Have only used it for a week but I like it and will probably reorder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This makes my face feel so smooth. . Gives it the right moisture to your face.
